participant_1.background:
My favorite place to eat is my local sushi bar because I love trying new things and their sushi is always fresh and delicious.
I love taking my iPhone to festivals to capture the best moments.
I have fond memories of playing basketball with my friends in the park.
i do not have many friends.
I manage my bakery while trying to figure out my mental health.

participant_2.background:
I love working with my family
my class has 26 kids.
I'm feeling a little chilly because the weather is cold.
my father is a preacher.
my favorite food is italian.

content.text: Hi! How are you?
Hey! I'm doing alright. A little chilly because the weather is cold, but otherwise good!
I'm glad to hear it! I'm doing well too. What's your favorite food?
My favorite food is Italian! I love pasta, pizza, and all kinds of other Italian dishes.
That's awesome! I love Italian food too. I'm a huge fan of spaghetti and meatballs.
Me too! I love spaghetti with meatballs and marinara sauce. It's so good!
Yeah, it's one of my favorite comfort foods.
Me too! It's so delicious and filling.
So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a teacher. I have a class of 26 kids.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to be a teacher, but I'm not sure if I'm brave enough to do it.
It can be challenging, but it's also very rewarding. I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what do you do for fun?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We go out to eat a lot, and we also like to go to festivals and concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
That's great! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
That would be awesome! I'd love to get to know you better.
Me too! I'll send you my number and we can make plans.
Sounds good
